channel.title: Npc emotes
channel.description:
so ive just been fixing emotes for my npc that are glitched. and i came across jungle demon. but when it was spawned, it was all glitched.
to add a walk/run emote for it, would i have to add the npc to entityDef? or is there some file i can edit the walk/run in?
